issues.title: The plugin manager incorrectly caches plugin versions between embedder calls
Remove all plugin configuration manipulation from the plugin manager
Remove all mirror, authentication, and proxy handling out of WagonManager and into a neutral Maven implementation
Deprecate all methods in MavenProject that relate to reporting.
Review and fix hashCode/equals methods of ArtifactRepository implementations
MavenProject::getParent() returns a MavenProject that is NOT interpolated
build extension libraries should be added to the current artifact filter used by the plugin manager
Artifact resolver incorrectly selects repository which doesn't contain the selected version
multi-project build that creates it's own plugins needs bootstrapping
Mojo in forked lifecycle invoked in reactor build cannot find reactor dependency
uninstantiable expressions fail, even if not required
<pluginManagement><plugins><plugin><dependencies> do not propogate to child POM plugins (potentially scoped to only affecting child POM plugins that live within a <profile>)
local repository path cannot have special characters
only first active proxy considered/used
